mapper.select: select a.userid,a.userphone,a.bankcardnumbers as bankcardnumbers,a.identitycard,a.name,b.certification as certification from tb_userinformation a join tb_useraccount b on b.userinformationid = a.userinformationid where a.userid=(select c.id from tb_user c where c.username=#{username})
select * from tb_loans where userid=(select id from tb_user where username=#{username}) and loansstate in(1,2,3,4,5,6,7,10,12)
mapper.insert:
select seq_tb_loans_id.nextval from dual
insert into tb_loans (loansid,userid,username,userphone,loansmoney,loansinterestrate,refundway,refunddeadline,loansused,describe,loancase,begintime,loanstype,loansstate) values (#{loansid},#{userid},#{name},#{userphone},#{loansmoney}*10000,#{loansinterestrate},#{refundway},#{refunddeadline},#{loansused},#{describe},#{loanscase}, sysdate,#{type},1)
insert into tb_loanstype (loanstype,loansid,loanstypename,houseproperty,appraisalreport,globalvalue) values (#{type},#{loansid},'房屋抵押贷',#{houseproperty},#{appraisalreport},#{globalvalue}*10000)
insert into tb_loanstype (loanstype,loansid,loanstypename,carinformation,appraisalreport,globalvalue) values (#{type},#{loansid},'车辆抵押贷',#{carinfo},#{appraisalreport},#{globalvalue}*10000)
